A user is experiencing issues with the installation process of the library on Windows using pip. The user has tried several methods, including upgrading pip and using a virtual environment, but the issue persists. Another user has suggested using the .whl file instead of the .tar.gz file for installation. The maintainer has acknowledged the issue and is looking into it.

issue_title: Cron module does not add all cron job for all hosts when using delegate to localhost.
summary: The user is running an unsupported version of `ansible-core` (2.11) and has been advised to test their code against a supported version. A playbook has been provided to demonstrate the issue, which adds a cron job to multiple hosts using the `cron` module.
